name: Two Spies
description:
Two Spies is a turn-based spy training program where you face off against a friend in Cold War Europe. Sneak to gain cover, control cities' informants to capture areas of the map, deduce your target's location – or trick them into revealing it – and strike to win the round.

- Board-game style maps
- Play on local wireless, "pass and play", or internet play against a friend
- Training bot helps you learn the ropes
- Realtime turn-based gameplay
- Based on a lost cold war spy training program
- Trick your friend by doing what they least expect
- No consumable in app purchases
